description: This file contains code for initializing a PDF knowledge base, downloading sample PDFs, setting up a vector database with LanceDB, and querying the knowledge base with filters, including class and method definitions, external library imports, and sample data handling.

classes.name: LanceDb
classes.description: A class representing the LanceDB vector database used for storing and querying document vectors.

classes.name: PDFKnowledgeBase
classes.description: A class for managing a knowledge base of PDF documents, including loading and filtering.

classes.name: Agent
classes.description: A class for interacting with the knowledge base, executing queries, and managing search filters.

methods.name: download_knowledge_filters_sample_data
methods.description: Function to download sample PDF files for testing and populating the knowledge base.

methods.name: load
methods.description: Method to load documents into the knowledge base or vector database.

methods.name: print_response
methods.description: Method to generate and display a response based on a query and filters.
